LanguageData.CoreTakeover.label: AI core takeover
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[PAWN_nameFull] flying into a berserk rage [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[PAWN_nameFull] stumbling forward with a psychotic look on [PAWN_possessive] face [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->with a desperate look on [PAWN_possessive] face
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: circumstance_phrase->while trying to fight against it
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] loses control over the AI in [PAWN_possessive] head.
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[PAWN_possessive] teeth are bared in a deadly snarl.
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[PAWN_possessive] eyes are glowing brightly red.
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->Spittle is flying from [PAWN_possessive] mouth as [PAWN_nameFull] screams with insane rage and pain.
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] has lost part of [PAWN_possessive] clothing.
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.16: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] has lost control over his body.
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.17: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is depicted with the snarling face of a [Animal].
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.19: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] has a murderous glint in [PAWN_possessive] eye.
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.20: desc_sentence->[PAWN_possessive] entire body seems to be trembling with hatred.
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.21: desc_sentence->[PAWN_possessive] face is set in a look of twisted serenity.
LanguageData.CoreTakeover.rulePack.rulesStrings.22: desc_sentence->A single tear rolls down [PAWN_possessive] face.
